blast away the financial storm clouds that may hold you back. </p>\n\n                <p>Life Enhancement has an entire line of healthy drink mixes, \n                many of which are \n They\n                also include the necessary enzyme cofactors vitamin B<sub>6</sub>, vitamin C, copper, and\n                folic acid, along with natural flavors. </p>\n\n                <p>Also in the healthy energy drink mix product line are <b>Memory Upgrade™</b>, \n                <b>Memory Upgrade II™</b>, and\n                <b>Memory Upgrade III™ Sugar-Free.</b> These formulations are based on the\n                nutrient choline, which is the precursor to an important memory molecule\n                involved in concentration and focus.* As we age, choline becomes less bioavailable, with serious\n                consequences for memory function. The <b>Memory Upgrade</b> family are great-tasting, natural,\n                fruit-flavored citrus cooler containing choline and essential nutrient\n                cofactors plus the important amino acid taurine. The <b>Memory Upgrades</b>\n                make it easy to ensure adequate levels of choline. </p>\n\n                <p>Some of the choline in your diet is used by your brain and motor nerves to make the\n                neurotransmitter acetylcholine, which is critical for proper memory function\n                and muscle tone.* Taurine is a brain food that provides your brain with a vital\n                nutrient needed for proper function.* Use <b>Memory Upgrade III</b> to help \n                <a href=\"http://www.life-enhancement.com/productList.aspx?type=category&amp;id=6\">preserve and protect your memory function</a>.*</p>\n\n                <p>A <b>BLAST™</b> family product can be taken });\n\n\t\t\t$(\"#emailAddressBtn\").click(function () { submitEmailForm(); return false; });\n\n\t\t\t$(\"#emailAddress\").click(function () {\n\t\t\t\tclearEmailTextbox();\n\t\t\t});\n\n\t\t\tstartTimer();\n\t\t});\n\n\t\tfunction clearEmailTextbox() {\n\t\t\tif ($(\"#emailAddress\").val() === \"My e-mail address\")\n\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t\t$(\"#emailAddress\").css('color', '#000');\n\t\t\t\t$(\"#emailAddress\").val('');\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\n\t\tfunction resetEmailForm() {\n\t\t\t$(\"#postSignUp\").hide();\n\t\t\t$(\"#preSignUp\").show();\n\t\t\t$(\"#emailAddress\").css('color', '#000');\n\t\t\t$(\"#emailAddress\").val('');\n\t\t\t$(\"#emailAddress\").focus();\n\t\t\t$(\"#postSignUp\").html(\"<img src=\\\"/images/loading.gif\\\" alt=\\\"Loading Indicator\\\" />\");\n\t\t}\n\t\t\n\t\tfunction submitEmailForm() {\n\t\t\t$(\"#preSignUp\").hide();\n\t\t\t$(\"#postSignUp\").show();\n\n\t\t\tvar email = $(\"#emailAddress\").val();\n\t\t\tvar dataString = \"{'emailAddress':'\" + email + \"'}\";\n\n\t\t\t$.ajax({\n\t\t\t\ttype: \"POST\",\n\t\t\t\turl: \"/ajaxFunctions.asmx/emmaSubscribe\",\n\t\t\t\tdata: dataString,\n\t\t\t\tcontentType: \"application/json; return false;\\\">Add another e-mail address</a>\");\n\t\t\t\t\t\t$(\"#postSignUp\").css('color', 'green');\n\t\t\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t\t\telse {\n\t\t\t\t\t\t$(\"#postSignUp\").html(\"Perhaps you mistyped your e-mail address?<br /><br /><a href=\\\"http://www.life-enhancement.com\\\" onclick=\\\"resetEmailForm();
